entry.title: Echeveria sp.
entry.summary:
Vendor: SpringerGarden
Type: Succulent
Price: 9.99

Dimension:

The plant is about 5-6 cm or 2-2/5 inch in diameter

Care Instructions:

-Water your succulents or cactus for 7-10 days once;

-Give them some indirect sunlight.

 

Want the pots? Check our planter section https://www.springergarden.com/collections/all-pots

Want us to put the succulents into the pots? Purchase here https://www.springergarden.com/collections/tools/products/handcraft-fee

Or you can purchase the soil yourself to DIY ❤ https://www.springergarden.com/collections/tools
